verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to the land <WH776> shadowing <WH6767> with wings, <WH3671> which <WH834> is beyond <WH5676> the rivers <WH5104> of Ethiopia: <WH3568>

That sends <WH7971> ambassadors <WH6735> by the sea, <WH3220> even in vessels <WH3627> of bulrushes <WH1573> on the waters, <WH4325> saying, Go, <WH3212> you swift <WH7031> messengers, <WH4397> to a nation <WH1471> scattered <WH4900> and peeled, <WH4178> to a people <WH5971> terrible <WH3372> from their beginning <WH1931> till now; <WH1973> a nation <WH1471> meted <WH6978> out and trodden <WH4001> down, whose <WH834> land <WH776> the rivers <WH5104> have spoiled! <WH958>

All <WH3605> you inhabitants <WH3427> of the world, <WH8398> and dwellers <WH7931> on the earth, <WH776> see <WH7200> you, when he lifts <WH5375> up an ensign <WH5251> on the mountains; <WH2022> and when he blows <WH8628> a trumpet, <WH7782> hear <WH8085> you.

For so <WH3541> the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, I will take my rest, <WH8252> and I will consider <WH5027> in my dwelling <WH4349> place like a clear <WH6703> heat <WH2527> on herbs, <WH219> and like a cloud <WH5645> of dew <WH2919> in the heat <WH2527> of harvest. <WH7105>

For before <WH6440> the harvest, <WH7105> when the bud <WH6525> is perfect, <WH8552> and the sour <WH1155> grape <WH1155> is ripening <WH1580> in the flower, <WH5328> he shall both cut <WH3772> off the sprigs <WH2150> with pruning <WH4211> hooks, and take <WH5493> away <WH5493> and cut <WH8456> down the branches. <WH5189>

They shall be left <WH5800> together <WH3162> to the fowls <WH5861> of the mountains, <WH2022> and to the beasts <WH929> of the earth: <WH776> and the fowls <WH5861> shall summer <WH6972> on them, and all <WH3605> the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776> shall winter <WH2778> on them.

In that time <WH6256> shall the present <WH7862> be brought <WH2986> to the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> of a people <WH5971> scattered <WH4900> and peeled, <WH4178> and from a people <WH5971> terrible <WH3372> from their beginning <WH1931> till now; <WH1973> a nation <WH1471> meted <WH6978> out and trodden <WH4001> under foot, <WH4001> whose <WH834> land <WH776> the rivers <WH5104> have spoiled, <WH958> to the place <WH4725> of the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> the mount <WH2022> Zion. <WH6726>
